resources.string: Library, will use the MediaPlayer and AudioManager class to enable media play. Recently played and the lists of track will all be populated using a Custom ArrayAdapter, which will show the song image, artist name and song title of media files available on the device.

Now Playing, will use the MediaPlayer and AudioManager class to enable media play. Recently added, recently played and favourites will all be populated using a Custom ArrayAdapter, which will all show the song image, artist name and song title
Playlists, will use the MediaPlayer and AudioManager class to enable media play.

Favourites, will use the MediaPlayer and AudioManager class to enable media play. Favourite lists of track will all be populated using a Custom ArrayAdapter, which will show the artist name, song title, and album name of media file that has been marked as favourites.
The app for the music you love
